title: EP 81: International Madam
itunes:title: EP 81: International Madam
description:
In this episode we speak with Nives Gadoni who ran New York's underground brothels and hosted sex parties for the Wall Street elite. In addition to running a prostitution ring, she also sold drugs to her customers and was eventually busted for drug distribution after being snitched on by former Bad Boy associate "Uncle Paulie". Nives clientele included some of the US Governments highest ranking officials including members of the White House! Listen as she talks about her former life and clients, including her description of Donald Trumps ideal female.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
